Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-44487 affecting package golang for versions less than 1.20.10
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-44487 affecting package golang for versions less than 1.20.10. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package golang is earlier than 1.20.10, affected by CVE-2023-44487
